alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 3:58AM PST until November 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in areas above 6500 feet, with up to 10 inches in the highest mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County for elevations above 6500 feet. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Blowing snow may result in reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
